mapper.select: SELECT a.`code` FROM beauty_authority a LEFT JOIN beauty_role_authority ra ON ra.authority_id = a.id LEFT JOIN beauty_role r ON r.id = ra.role_id LEFT JOIN beauty_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN beauty_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.id

SELECT r.url, a.`code` FROM beauty_resource r LEFT JOIN beauty_authority_resource ar ON r.id = ar.resource_id AND type = 2 LEFT JOIN beauty_authority a ON a.id = ar.authority_id WHERE a.`code` != '' ORDER BY r.id
